statements.statement: SELECT THUOCGAYNGHINGOADR_ID ,PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID ,TT.DUOC_ID ,TT.HAMLUONG ,LIEUDUNGMOTLAN ,SOLANDUNG ,TT.DUONGDUNG_ID ,NGAYBATDAU ,NGAYKETTHUC ,HANSUDUNG ,TT.HANGSANXUAT_ID ,LYDODUNGTHUOC ,D.TENDUOCDAYDU TENDUOC ,D.DONVITINH DVT ,DUONGDUNG.DICTIONARY_NAME DUONGDUNG FROM TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_ADR TT INNER JOIN TM_DUOC D ON TT.DUOC_ID=D.DUOC_ID LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DUONGDUNG ON TT.DUONGDUNG_ID=DUONGDUNG.DICTIONARY_ID WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$'

SELECT THUOCSUDUNGDONGTHOI_ID ,PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID ,DT.DUOC_ID ,DT.DONVITINH_ID ,SONGAY ,NGAYBATDAU ,NGAYKETTHUC ,D.TENDUOCDAYDU TENDUOC ,D.DONVITINH DVT ,D.HAMLUONG HAMLUONG FROM TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_DONGTHOI DT INNER JOIN TM_DUOC D ON DT.DUOC_ID=D.DUOC_ID WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$'

SELECT PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID ,SOPHIEU ,BENHNHAN_ID ,CANNANG ,PHANUNGNHANXET ,CHANDOAN_CHIDINH_DIEUTRI ,TAISDTHUOC_TRIEUCHUNGLAPLAI ,TAISDTHUOC_KHONGXHTRCHUNGCU ,CACBENHSULIENQUAN ,BINHLUANBACSIDIEUTRI ,YKIENCHUYENGIATHAMDINH ,NGUOILAP_ID ,SODIENTHOAI_NGUOILAP ,EMAIL_NGUOILAP ,NGAYLAPBAOCAO ,CHUCVU_ID ,SOFAX ,DANGBAOCAO ,NGAYTAO ,NGUOITAO_ID ,NGAYCAPNHAT ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ,NGAYXUATHIENPHANUNG ,XUATHIENPHANUNGSAU ,MOTABIEUHIENADR ,CACXETNGHIEMLIENQUAN ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TUVONG ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DEDOATINHMANG ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_NHAPVIEN ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TANTAT ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DITATTHAINHI ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_KHONGNT ,SAUKHINGUNG_CO ,SAUKHINGUNG_KHONG ,SAUKHINGUNG_GIAMLIEU ,SAUKHINGUNG_KHONGCOTT ,TAISD_CO ,TAISD_KHONG ,TAISD_KHONGTAISD ,TAISD_KHONGCOTT ,KQ_TUVONG ,KQ_CHUAHOIPHUC ,KQ_CODICHUNG ,KQ_KHONGRO ,KQ_TUVONGKHONGLIENQUAN ,KQ_DANGHOIPHUC ,KQ_HOIPHUCKHONGCODC ,DG_CHACCHAN ,DG_KHONGCHACCHAN ,DG_COKHANANG ,DG_CHUAPHANLOAI ,DG_KHAC ,DG_KHAC_TEXT ,THANG_NARAJIO ,THANG_WHO ,LANDAU ,BOSUNG ,GUIXACNHAN ,PHANLOAIPHANUNG ,PHANUNGDACOTRONGYVAN ,NHAPDULIEU_HECSDL ,NHAPDULIEU_VIGIFLOW ,THUOCMOI ,THUOCCU ,NGHIEMTRONG ,KHONGNGHIEMTRONG ,MUCDO_DEDOATINHMANG ,MUCDO_NHAPVIEN ,MUCDO_GAYDITAT ,MUCDO_LAMDUNG ,GUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG ,NGAYGUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG ,GUIBAOCAO_UMC ,NGAYGUIBAOCAO_UMC ,KQTD_CHACCHAN ,KQTD_KHONGCHACCHAN ,KQTD_KHAC ,KQTD_KHAC_TEXT ,KQTD_COKHANANG ,KQTD_CHUAPHANLOAI ,KQTD_COTHE ,KQTD_KHONGTHEPHANLOAI ,NGUOIQUANLYBAOCAO_ID ,NGAY_QUANLYBAOCAO FROM TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH WHERE BENHNHAN_ID='$BENHNHAN_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_S.nextval as value from dual
INSERT INTO TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH ( PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID ,BENHNHAN_ID ,CANNANG ,CHANDOAN_CHIDINH_DIEUTRI ,CACBENHSULIENQUAN ,BINHLUANBACSIDIEUTRI ,YKIENCHUYENGIATHAMDINH ,NGUOILAP_ID ,SODIENTHOAI_NGUOILAP ,EMAIL_NGUOILAP ,NGAYLAPBAOCAO ,CHUCVU_ID ,SOFAX ,DANGBAOCAO ,NGAYTAO ,NGUOITAO_ID ,NGAYCAPNHAT ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ,NGAYXUATHIENPHANUNG ,XUATHIENPHANUNGSAU ,MOTABIEUHIENADR ,CACXETNGHIEMLIENQUAN ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TUVONG ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DEDOATINHMANG ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_NHAPVIEN ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TANTAT ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DITATTHAINHI ,MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_KHONGNT ,SAUKHINGUNG_CO ,SAUKHINGUNG_KHONG ,SAUKHINGUNG_GIAMLIEU ,SAUKHINGUNG_KHONGCOTT ,TAISD_CO ,TAISD_KHONG ,TAISD_KHONGTAISD ,TAISD_KHONGCOTT ,KQ_TUVONG ,KQ_CHUAHOIPHUC ,KQ_CODICHUNG ,KQ_KHONGRO ,KQ_TUVONGKHONGLIENQUAN ,KQ_DANGHOIPHUC ,KQ_HOIPHUCKHONGCODC ,DG_CHACCHAN ,DG_KHONGCHACCHAN ,DG_COKHANANG ,DG_CHUAPHANLOAI ,DG_KHAC ,DG_KHAC_TEXT ,THANG_NARAJIO ,THANG_WHO ,LANDAU ,BOSUNG ,GUIXACNHAN ,PHANLOAIPHANUNG ,PHANUNGDACOTRONGYVAN ,NHAPDULIEU_HECSDL ,NHAPDULIEU_VIGIFLOW ,THUOCMOI ,THUOCCU ,NGHIEMTRONG ,KHONGNGHIEMTRONG ,MUCDO_DEDOATINHMANG ,MUCDO_NHAPVIEN ,MUCDO_GAYDITAT ,MUCDO_LAMDUNG ,GUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG ,NGAYGUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG ,GUIBAOCAO_UMC ,NGAYGUIBAOCAO_UMC ,KQTD_CHACCHAN ,KQTD_KHONGCHACCHAN ,KQTD_KHAC ,KQTD_KHAC_TEXT ,KQTD_COKHANANG ,KQTD_CHUAPHANLOAI ,KQTD_COTHE ,KQTD_KHONGTHEPHANLOAI ,NGUOIQUANLYBAOCAO_ID ,NGAY_QUANLYBAOCAO) VALUES ( #ID# ,#BENHNHAN_ID# ,#CANNANG# ,#CHANDOAN_CHIDINH_DIEUTRI# ,#CACBENHSULIENQUAN# ,#BINHLUANBACSIDIEUTRI# ,#YKIENCHUYENGIATHAMDINH# ,#NGUOILAP_ID# ,#SODIENTHOAI_NGUOILAP# ,#EMAIL_NGUOILAP# ,#NGAYLAPBAOCAO# ,#CHUCVU_ID# ,#SOFAX# ,#DANGBAOCAO# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,#NGAYXUATHIENPHANUNG# ,#XUATHIENPHANUNGSAU# ,#MOTABIEUHIENADR# ,#CACXETNGHIEMLIENQUAN# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TUVONG# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DEDOATINHMANG# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_NHAPVIEN# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TANTAT# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DITATTHAINHI# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_KHONGNT# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_CO# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_KHONG# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_GIAMLIEU# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_KHONGCOTT# ,#TAISD_CO# ,#TAISD_KHONG# ,#TAISD_KHONGTAISD# ,#TAISD_KHONGCOTT# ,#KQ_TUVONG# ,#KQ_CHUAHOIPHUC# ,#KQ_CODICHUNG# ,#KQ_KHONGRO# ,#KQ_TUVONGKHONGLIENQUAN# ,#KQ_DANGHOIPHUC# ,#KQ_HOIPHUCKHONGCODC# ,#DG_CHACCHAN# ,#DG_KHONGCHACCHAN# ,#DG_COKHANANG# ,#DG_CHUAPHANLOAI# ,#DG_KHAC# ,#DG_KHAC_TEXT# ,#THANG_NARAJIO# ,#THANG_WHO# ,#LANDAU# ,#BOSUNG# ,#GUIXACNHAN# ,#PHANLOAIPHANUNG# ,#PHANUNGDACOTRONGYVAN# ,#NHAPDULIEU_HECSDL# ,#NHAPDULIEU_VIGIFLOW# ,#THUOCMOI# ,#THUOCCU# ,#NGHIEMTRONG# ,#KHONGNGHIEMTRONG# ,#MUCDO_DEDOATINHMANG# ,#MUCDO_NHAPVIEN# ,#MUCDO_GAYDITAT# ,#MUCDO_LAMDUNG# ,#GUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG# ,#NGAYGUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG# ,#GUIBAOCAO_UMC# ,#NGAYGUIBAOCAO_UMC# ,#KQTD_CHACCHAN# ,#KQTD_KHONGCHACCHAN# ,#KQTD_KHAC# ,#KQTD_KHAC_TEXT# ,#KQTD_COKHANANG# ,#KQTD_CHUAPHANLOAI# ,#KQTD_COTHE# ,#KQTD_KHONGTHEPHANLOAI# ,#NGUOIQUANLYBAOCAO_ID# ,#NGAY_QUANLYBAOCAO# )

select TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_ADR_S.nextval as value from dual
INSERT INTO TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_ADR ( THUOCGAYNGHINGOADR_ID ,PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID ,DUOC_ID ,HAMLUONG ,LIEUDUNGMOTLAN ,SOLANDUNG ,DUONGDUNG_ID ,NGAYBATDAU ,NGAYKETTHUC ,HANSUDUNG ,HANGSANXUAT_ID ,NGUOITAO_ID ,NGAYTAO ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ,NGAYCAPNHAT ,LYDODUNGTHUOC) VALUES ( #ID# ,#PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID# ,#DUOC_ID# ,#HAMLUONG# ,#LIEUDUNGMOTLAN# ,#SOLANDUNG# ,#DUONGDUNG_ID# ,#NGAYBATDAU# ,#NGAYKETTHUC# ,#HANSUDUNG# ,#HANGSANXUAT_ID# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#LYDODUNGTHUOC#)

select TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_DONGTHOI_S.nextval as value from dual
INSERT INTO TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_DONGTHOI ( THUOCSUDUNGDONGTHOI_ID ,PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID ,DUOC_ID ,NGAYBATDAU ,NGAYKETTHUC) VALUES ( #ID# ,#PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID# ,#DUOC_ID# ,#NGAYBATDAU# ,#NGAYKETTHUC# )
statements.statement: IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID FROM TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$' AND NGUOITAO_ID='$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$') BEGIN SELECT -1 AS result END else begin SELECT 1 AS result end
